anyOf.title: Credit Transfer
anyOf.description: Sender initiated bank or wire transfer.

anyOf.title: Debit Transfer
anyOf.description: Receiver initiated bank or wire transfer.

anyOf.title: Direct Debit
anyOf.description: Direct debit from the customers bank account.

anyOf.title: Netting
anyOf.description: Intercompany clearing or clearing between partners.

anyOf.title: Other
anyOf.description: Other or mutually defined means of payment.

key.title: Key
key.description: The payment means used to make the advance.

ref.title: Reference
ref.description: ID or reference for the advance.

grant.title: Grant
grant.description: If this "advance" payment has come from a public grant or subsidy, set this to true.

percent.title: Percent
percent.description: How much as a percentage of the total with tax was paid

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: If different from the parent document's base currency.

card.title: Card
card.description: Details of the payment that was made via a credit or debit card.

credit_transfer.title: Credit Transfer
credit_transfer.description: Details about how the payment was made by credit (bank) transfer.

ext.title: Extensions
ext.description: Tax extensions required by tax regimes or addons.

meta.title: Meta
meta.description: Additional details useful for the parties involved.

Advance.description: Advance represents a single payment that has been made already, such as a deposit on an intent to purchase, or as credit from a previous invoice which was later corrected or cancelled.

last4.title: Last 4
last4.description: Last 4 digits of the card's Primary Account Number (PAN).

holder.title: Holder Name
holder.description: Name of the person whom the card belongs to.

Card.description: Card contains simplified card holder data as a reference for the customer.

bic.title: BIC
bic.description: Bank Identifier Code used for international transfers.

number.title: Number
number.description: Account number, if IBAN not available.

branch.title: Branch
branch.description: Bank office branch address, not normally required.

CreditTransfer.description: CreditTransfer contains fields that can be used for making payments via a bank transfer or wire.
